messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: It is helpful to know that people from different cultures can act in different ways. This can help us avoid problems when we communicate. However, it is very important to remember that using stereotypes can be bad for business relationships. Stereotypes are simple but often untrue ideas about what a group of people is like.

A country's culture can affect how we think and act. But many other things also affect us. These include the area we are from and the groups we are part of. Our age, gender, company culture, and our own life experiences are also important. Therefore, we should be aware of these possible differences. But we should not use this information to judge every person from a whole country.
